title: I Love Salad
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Western, Juice bar, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Small place offering western style food and marks the vegetarian and vegan items. Apart from salad there's a vegan chickpea burger with seaweed fries and a raw vegan cheesecake. Need to specify if you don't want honey. It's located down the dirt road next to 7/11 in Chalok, near Buddha View dive school. Since Sept 2014.
